nodes.text: Armin Devonan was a humanoid female employee of Czerka Corporation on the planet Corellia during the Galactic War waged between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic.

She maintained the communications tower in the Czerka courtyard, and held the Czerka security manifest for Czerka's facilities in the area. Devonan was killed during the Battle of Corellia by Imperial forces who took the files, but not before the Imperials had to steal a Czerka ion round from the courtyard to destroy the main structure of the tower on which the Czerka employee stood, forcing Devonan from her metal platform which she was repairing into a lethal confrontation.
Armin Devonan sported a blaster rifle and a light leather armor. She was also equipped with grenades and a repair tool which emmitted a red-beam.
